data.name: Cộng đồng Việt Nhật ( Vietnam-Japan community )

message:
Some friends in Vietnam say that they want to know how to hunting jobs in Japan. But I had a limit to discuss.

Does anyone know any homepages about job hunting in Japan written in Vietnamese?

100001458099624.name: グエンチュン ドゥック

825104480839564.message:
An old article from Gakutomo. I hope this is useful for your friends 
http://gakutomo.com/cuoc-song-o-nhat/2367/

825105177506161.message: Ohh that's great! Thank you so much.

825105424172803.message: I do agree with you that we need someone who knows about Job Hunting. I think that it'll be certainly useful for Vnese people during living and studying in Japan :)

825105650839447.message: 実は日本語がうまくしゃべられない人だったら就活が大変ですね。

825108840839128.message:
it's hard if you want to look for a job in janpan but you can uses english!
whether jobs using English, you still have the ability to know Japanese communication to find a new job easier!

825113504171995.message: I'm waiting for Visa to go to Japan next month. I hope that my ability of speaking English would help me to get a good job. I've studied Japanese for 3 months in Viet Nam. Thus, it's hard to me to get a part time job by using Japanese :(

from.name: グエンチュン ドゥック

825121300837882.message: 貫井 雄太 what kind of job? I think part-time job and full-time job will be asked for different skills.

825123154171030.message:
This means that Vũ Xuân Dũng have expertise, right? 
congratulations! 
if your work can be used both in Japanese and English, it is great!

825140277502651.message: Sorry if I give you an impolite question, what is the purpose of your seeking homepages about job hunting in Japan wirtten in Vietnamese? Do you have a business plan to build something like that?
